fcb_fab_flexible_title: [Official] PCBONLINE: SMT Assembly and PTH PCB Assembly of the Highest Quality
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_title: SMT Assembly and PTH PCB Assembly at PCBONLINE
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_zero: PCBONLINE's PCB assembly factory is in Shenzhen, which provides quality SMT assembly and PTH assembly for clients around the globe for medical, aerospace, defense, industrial, automotive, communication, and consumer electronics.
fcb_fab_flexible_overview_top_word_one: PCBONLINE has 30 mature SMT and PTH assembly lines. We assemble flexible PCBs, rigid-flex PCBs, multilayer PCBs, single/double-sided PCBs, HDI PCBs, ceramic PCBs, lead-free PCBs, and many more. Whether you have some components or no components, PCBONLINE is always your one-stop solution expert and PCB assembler to fulfill your projects.
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_title: About SMT Assembly and PTH PCB Assembly
fcb_fab_flexible_advantages_bottom_word_: • SMT assembly is surface mount assembly. It means mounting SMDs on bare PCBs without drilling. SMDs need reflow soldering.
• PTH PCB assembly, or THT, is through-hole assembly. PTH assembly requires drilling on PCBs and wave soldering.
• SMT assembly is automatic, and PTH PCB assembly is usually done manually.
• PTH components have much longer pins than SMDs, and SMDs have much smaller sizes (minimum 01005).
• In the whole PCB assembly process, SMT assembly happens first, and then PCBAs are transferred to the PTH assembly lines.
• Before batch PCBA production, the first piece should be manufactured and tested, and a report is generated for clients to review and approve batch production.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_title: PCBONLINE's Strengths in SMT Assembly and PTH PCB Assembly
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_one: ◆ SMT and PTH assembly lines are equipped with Pansonic and Yamaha SMT machines, 3D-SPI, X-Ray, 3D-AOI, reflow soldering ovens, Ersa wave soldering machines, etc.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_two: ◆ Provide medical-grade SMT and PTH assembly for senior engineers, companies, and institutes with the highest quality.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_three: ◆ SMT and PTH assembly are IPC-A-610 Class 3 compliant and ISO 9001:2015, REACH, RoHS, IATF 16949, and UL certified.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_four: ◆ We offer free BOM and Gerber files check and useful suggestions if there are issues before giving a quote.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_five: ◆ Professional solution experts provide free one-on-one engineering support and seek to save client's costs by the latest technology and manufacturing optimization.
fcb_fab_flexible_why_choose_word_six: ◆ After SMT and PTH PCB assembly, we conduct the Kelvin four-terminal sensing, functional test, thermal aging test, conformal coating, etc.

fcb_fab_flexible_related_rigid_word: SMT stencil enables you to print pastes solder precisely and quickly onto the PCB, thus you can place the components onto the solder joints. Buy from PCBONLNE to get the most accurate SMT stencil.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_tick_word: High volume PCB assembly refers to a large quantity of printed circuit board assemblies of 10,000 pieces or more, including DFM cecking and DFT checking.
fcb_fab_flexible_related_multilayer_word: If you order a turnkey PCB assembly from PCBONLINE, you will get a perfect OEM service and ready-to-use electronic products. All you need to provide is only your requirements, and we will make the best products as you wish.
